translated: and from feeling, craving arises.

original: sred pa las skyes len pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa las skyes len pa'o //
translated: From craving, grasping arises,

original: len pa las ni de bzhin srid //
analyzed: len pa las ni de bzhin srid //
translated: and from grasping, becoming arises.🔽From becoming, birth arises,

original: srid pa las ni skye ba dag / skye bas rga shi 'byung bar mkhyen //
analyzed: srid pa las ni skye ba dag / skye bas rga shi 'byung bar mkhyen //
translated: and from birth, aging and death arise.

original: 'gro ba dag ni rkyen rnams las //🔽skyes zhes yang dag mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba dag ni rkyen rnams las // skyes zhes yang dag mkhyen pa'o //
translated: The world arises from conditions,🔽and the one who knows this is the one who knows the world.

original: de nas 'di yi blo gros nges par song ba ni //
analyzed: de nas 'di yi blo gros nges par song ba ni //
translated: Then, his wisdom became certain:

original: skye ba zad las 'chi dang rga ba 'gags pa ste //🔽srid pa nyams pa las kyang skye pa nyams pa nyid //
analyzed: skye ba zad las 'chi dang rga ba 'gags pa ste // srid pa nyams pa las kyang skye pa nyams pa nyid //
translated: From the cessation of birth comes the cessation of old age and death.

original: len pa 'gags pa las ni srid pa rnam ldog cing //
analyzed: len pa 'gags pa las ni srid pa rnam ldog cing //
translated: From the cessation of the decline of existence comes the cessation of birth.🔽From the cessation of grasping comes the cessation of existence.

original: de nas srid 'gags pa las de ni 'gag pa ste //
analyzed: de nas srid 'gags pa las de ni 'gag pa ste //
translated: From the cessation of existence comes the cessation of birth.

original: tshor ba yod pa min na sred pa yod ma yin//🔽reg las chud zos gyur na tshor ba yod min zhing //
analyzed: tshor ba yod pa min na sred pa yod ma yin// reg las chud zos gyur na tshor ba yod min zhing //
translated: If there is no feeling, there is no craving.🔽If there is no contact, there is no feeling.

original: skye mched 'jug pa med las reg pa zad pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched 'jug pa med las reg pa zad pa'o //
translated: From the cessation of the entry of the sense bases, contact ceases.

original: de bzhin ming dang gzugs ni yang dag 'gags pa las //
analyzed: de bzhin ming dang gzugs ni yang dag 'gags pa las //
translated: In the same way, from the cessation of name and form,

original: skye mched drug po thams cad rnam par nyams par byed //
analyzed: skye mched drug po thams cad rnam par nyams par byed //
translated: all six sense bases are destroyed.

original: rnam par shes pa 'gags las de dag 'gags pa ste ;
analyzed: rnam par shes pa 'gags las de dag 'gags pa ste ;
translated: From the cessation of consciousness, they cease.

original: /'du byed 'gags pa las kyang de ni 'gag pa'o //
analyzed: /'du byed 'gags pa las kyang de ni 'gag pa'o //
translated: From the cessation of formations, they cease.

original: ma rig pa ni mtha' dag med las de bzhin du //
analyzed: ma rig pa ni mtha' dag med las de bzhin du //
translated: From the cessation of all ignorance,

original: 'du byed 'gag par drang srong chen pos mkhyen pa ste //
analyzed: 'du byed 'gag par drang srong chen pos mkhyen pa ste //
translated: the cessation of formations is known by the Great Sage.

original: 'di las mkhyen bya 'di ni yang dag mkhyen mdzad nas //
analyzed: 'di las mkhyen bya 'di ni yang dag mkhyen mdzad nas //
translated: Having known what is to be known and what is real,

original: sangs rgyas zhes ni 'jig rten na rab gnas par gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes ni 'jig rten na rab gnas par gyur //
translated: And the name “Buddha” became well known in the world.

original: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa rab tu shar ba yi //
analyzed: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa rab tu shar ba yi //
translated: The sun of the eightfold noble path rose

original: rtse mor myur 'gro dam pa'i lta ba'i lam gyis ni //
analyzed: rtse mor myur 'gro dam pa'i lta ba'i lam gyis ni //
translated: And the path of the view of the noble ones, which quickly goes to the peak,

original: srid rtse'i bar las mchog gyur bdag med rnam gzigs nas //
analyzed: srid rtse'i bar las mchog gyur bdag med rnam gzigs nas //
translated: Saw the selflessness that is supreme above the peak of existence,

original: bud shing tshig pa'i me bzhin zhi bar gshegs par gyur //
analyzed: bud shing tshig pa'i me bzhin zhi bar gshegs par gyur //
translated: And then went to peace, like a fire whose fuel has been exhausted.

original: de nas bdag nyid mdzad pa de yi gyur pa ni //
analyzed: de nas bdag nyid mdzad pa de yi gyur pa ni //
translated: Then, the one who had done that,

original: mchog gi drang srong mchog dang mchog min mkhyen pa'i tshogs //
analyzed: mchog gi drang srong mchog dang mchog min mkhyen pa'i tshogs //
translated: The supreme sage, the assembly that knew the supreme and the non-supreme,

original: gna' ma rnams kyis don dam rgyu las gshegs pa yi //
analyzed: gna' ma rnams kyis don dam rgyu las gshegs pa yi //
translated: The one who had gone from the ultimate cause by the ancient ones,

original: snying po'i lam 'di bdag gis lhag par thob par gyur //
analyzed: snying po'i lam 'di bdag gis lhag par thob par gyur //
translated: I attained this path of the essence.

original: thun ni bzhi pa'i skya rengs shar ba'i yud tsam na //
analyzed: thun ni bzhi pa'i skya rengs shar ba'i yud tsam na //
translated: At the time of the rising of the dawn of the fourth watch,

original: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'byung po rnams ni zhi @54b ba na ;
analyzed: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'byung po rnams ni zhi @54b ba na ;
translated: The beings of the moving and unmoving worlds were pacified.

original: / drang srong mchog gis 'gyur ba med pa'i go 'phang dang // kun gyi mgon gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so //
analyzed: / drang srong mchog gis 'gyur ba med pa'i go 'phang dang // kun gyi mgon gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so //
translated: and the protector of all has attained omniscience.

original: de nyid 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen pa na //
analyzed: de nyid 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen pa na //
translated: This very thing was known by the Buddha himself,

original: bud med chang gis myos bzhin sa ni g-yos gyur la //
analyzed: bud med chang gis myos bzhin sa ni g-yos gyur la //
translated: and the earth trembled as if intoxicated by alcohol.

original: grub pa rnams kyis mngon gang phyogs ni rab snang ste //
analyzed: grub pa rnams kyis mngon gang phyogs ni rab snang ste //
translated: The directions were filled with the accomplished ones,

original: mkha' la rnga bo che rnams rab tu grag par gyur //
analyzed: mkha' la rnga bo che rnams rab tu grag par gyur //
translated: and great drums resounded in the sky.

original: dge ba'i rlung rnams rab tu zhi bar g-yos gyur zhing //
analyzed: dge ba'i rlung rnams rab tu zhi bar g-yos gyur zhing //
translated: Auspicious winds began to blow,

original: sprin med 'o ma rnams ni lha yis char phab ste //
analyzed: sprin med 'o ma rnams ni lha yis char phab ste //
translated: and the gods caused a rain of milk-like clouds to fall.

original: ljon shing rnams la dus min me tog 'bras bu rnams //
analyzed: ljon shing rnams la dus min me tog 'bras bu rnams //
translated: Out of season, flowers and fruits appeared on the trees,

original: mchod pa rab tu sbyor ba'i ched bzhin brul bar gyur ;
analyzed: mchod pa rab tu sbyor ba'i ched bzhin brul bar gyur ;
translated: as if scattered for the sake of making offerings.🔽Mandārava flowers, lotuses,

original: / man d'a ra ba'i me tog rnams dang padma dang // gser dang bee d'urya yi rang bzhin padma ni //
analyzed: / man d'a ra ba'i me tog rnams dang padma dang // gser dang bee d'urya yi rang bzhin padma ni //
translated: and lotuses made of gold and beryl

original: mkha' las bab pa rnams kyis sh'akya thub pa'i sa //
analyzed: mkha' las bab pa rnams kyis sh'akya thub pa'i sa //
translated: fell from the sky, covering the ground of the Sage Śākyamuni.

original: de tshe mtho ris bzhin du kun nas bkram par gyur //
analyzed: de tshe mtho ris bzhin du kun nas bkram par gyur //
translated: At that time, the whole world was as if in heaven.

original: yud tsam de ni kha cig khro ba med gyur la //
analyzed: yud tsam de ni kha cig khro ba med gyur la //
translated: For a moment, some became free from anger,

original: nad med gyur zhing mi dga' bar yang ma song ste //
analyzed: nad med gyur zhing mi dga' bar yang ma song ste //
translated: and they were not unhappy, nor did they become sick.

original: sdig pa bsnyen pa ma yin rgyags par ma byas shing //
analyzed: sdig pa bsnyen pa ma yin rgyags par ma byas shing //
translated: They did not approach evil, nor did they become arrogant,

original: grub pa brnyes pa bzhin du 'jig rten zhi bar gyur //
analyzed: grub pa brnyes pa bzhin du 'jig rten zhi bar gyur //
translated: and the world became peaceful, as if they had attained perfection.

original: thar pa 'dod pa'i lha yi tshogs rnams dga' ba ste //
analyzed: thar pa 'dod pa'i lha yi tshogs rnams dga' ba ste //
translated: The hosts of gods who desired liberation were delighted,

original: sems can 'og tu song ba rnams kyang dga' bar gyur //
analyzed: sems can 'og tu song ba rnams kyang dga' bar gyur //
translated: and even the beings who had fallen to lower realms were happy.

original: yon tan phyogs kyis 'phel bas chos ni rgyas pa ste //
analyzed: yon tan phyogs kyis 'phel bas chos ni rgyas pa ste //
translated: The Dharma spread, as its qualities increased in all directions,

original: rdul dang mun pa dag las 'gro ba gyen du byung //
analyzed: rdul dang mun pa dag las 'gro ba gyen du byung //

original: de yi las kyis ya mtshan dga' bas gang ba yi //
analyzed: de yi las kyis ya mtshan dga' bas gang ba yi //
translated: By his actions, the world was filled with wondrous joy,

original: bu ram shing pa'i rigs kyi mi skyong drang srong rnams //
analyzed: bu ram shing pa'i rigs kyi mi skyong drang srong rnams //
translated: and the sages of the Ikṣvāku royal lineage

original: rgyal po'i drang srong rnams dang drang srong che rnams kyis //
analyzed: rgyal po'i drang srong rnams dang drang srong che rnams kyis //
translated: the royal sages and the great sages

original: yang dag mchod rnams mkha' la gzhal med rnams su gnas //
analyzed: yang dag mchod rnams mkha' la gzhal med rnams su gnas //
translated: dwelt in the sky in their celestial palaces,

original: mthong min 'byung po'i tshogs kyis drang srong chen po yi //
analyzed: mthong min 'byung po'i tshogs kyis drang srong chen po yi //
translated: The hosts of invisible spirits,🔽the great sages, the teachers,

original: ston pa rnams ni mthon por 'thon zhing sgrogs pa ste //
analyzed: ston pa rnams ni mthon por 'thon zhing sgrogs pa ste //
translated: are exalted and proclaimed.

original: gson pa'i 'jig rten 'phel ba bzhin du dga' gyur zhing //
analyzed: gson pa'i 'jig rten 'phel ba bzhin du dga' gyur zhing //
translated: The living world is delighted as if it were flourishing,

original: ltung ba mchog la bzhin du bdud ni yi mug cing //
analyzed: ltung ba mchog la bzhin du bdud ni yi mug cing //
translated: and Mara is despondent as if he had fallen into a pit.

original: de nas nad mi mnga' ba zhag bdun bdag nyid kyis //
analyzed: de nas nad mi mnga' ba zhag bdun bdag nyid kyis //
translated: Then, for seven days, the one who is free from illness

original: sems la gzigs shing spyan mi 'dzums par bzhugs pa ste //
analyzed: sems la gzigs shing spyan mi 'dzums par bzhugs pa ste //
translated: dwells, gazing at the mind, his eyes unblinking.

original: kho bos 'dir ni rnam par thar pa brnyes so zhes //
analyzed: kho bos 'dir ni rnam par thar pa brnyes so zhes //
translated: The Sage, thinking, Here I have attained liberation,

original: thub pas yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur //
analyzed: thub pas yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur //
translated: fulfills the hopes of the mind.

original: de nas rkyen nyid thob pa 'di ni thub pa nyid //🔽bdag med @55a * //
analyzed: de nas rkyen nyid thob pa 'di ni thub pa nyid // bdag med @55a * //
translated: Then, having attained the condition of a Sage,

original: cho gar rnams par gzhag pas gsan nas ni //
analyzed: cho gar rnams par gzhag pas gsan nas ni //
translated: he hears the arrangement of the selflessness🔽of phenomena, which is the means of attaining peace,

original: zhi phyir 'jig rten dag la mchog tu brtse bas so //
analyzed: zhi phyir 'jig rten dag la mchog tu brtse bas so //
translated: out of supreme compassion for the world.

original: sangs rgyas spyan gyis rnam par gzigs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas spyan gyis rnam par gzigs par gyur pa'o //
translated: He is seen with the eye of a Buddha.

original: lta ba ngan pas chud zos 'bad la 'khrugs pa yi //
analyzed: lta ba ngan pas chud zos 'bad la 'khrugs pa yi //
translated: The world is agitated, its efforts wasted by bad views.

analyzed: 'gro ba rdul ni rgya chen dang ldan gzigs nas dang // rnam thar chos ni mchog tu phra pa nyid gzigs nas //
translated: Seeing the vast dust of beings, and seeing the supreme Dharma of liberation as most subtle,

original: g-yo ba med pa nyid phyir thugs ni mdzad par gyur //
analyzed: g-yo ba med pa nyid phyir thugs ni mdzad par gyur //
translated: His mind became inactive.

original: de nas sngon gyi dam bca' yang dag mkhyen gyur nas //
analyzed: de nas sngon gyi dam bca' yang dag mkhyen gyur nas //
translated: Then, knowing the former vow,

original: zhi ba'i gdams pa la ni so sor nges par gshegs //
analyzed: zhi ba'i gdams pa la ni so sor nges par gshegs //
translated: He went to the instructions for peace.

original: de nas chen po'i rdul dang chung ngu'i rdul nyid dang // ldan pa'i skye bor yid ni rnam par dpyad pa'o //
analyzed: de nas chen po'i rdul dang chung ngu'i rdul nyid dang // ldan pa'i skye bor yid ni rnam par dpyad pa'o //
translated: Then, his mind examined the people who possessed the dust of the great and the small,

original: de nas zhi ba'i don du gdams pa'i ched du nges par ni //
analyzed: de nas zhi ba'i don du gdams pa'i ched du nges par ni //
translated: Then, for the sake of the instruction for peace,🔽He definitely

analyzed: gzung ba'i bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs ni shes gyur nas //
translated: Understood the mind of the Sugata, which is the bliss of grasping,🔽And the lord of the heavenly realm approached,

original: mngon par snang zhing 'gro la phan par 'dod pa can //🔽mtho ris gnas pa'i gtso bo nyid ni nye bar 'ongs //🔽sdig pa spangs shing don mdzad gdan la bzhugs pa po //
analyzed: mngon par snang zhing 'gro la phan par 'dod pa can // mtho ris gnas pa'i gtso bo nyid ni nye bar 'ongs // sdig pa spangs shing don mdzad gdan la bzhugs pa po //
translated: Desiring to benefit beings and manifest.🔽The two supreme ones came to him, who had abandoned evil, accomplished the purpose, and sat on the seat,

original: mchog gi chos ni gzigs pa de la mchog gnyis so //
analyzed: mchog gi chos ni gzigs pa de la mchog gnyis so //
translated: The supreme Dharma.

original: mchog tu zhi bas rab tu bstod nas de gnyis kyis //
analyzed: mchog tu zhi bas rab tu bstod nas de gnyis kyis //
translated: Having praised him with the most peaceful words, they both

analyzed: 'jig rten phan pa'i don du tshig 'di gsol ba'o //
translated: made this request for the sake of benefiting the world:

original: ae ma 'gro ba 'di gang nor 'os 'di lta bu //
analyzed: ae ma 'gro ba 'di gang nor 'os 'di lta bu //
translated: “Alas, how can this world be deceived in this way?

original: skye dgu rnams la rjes su brtse mdzad khyed kyi thugs //
analyzed: skye dgu rnams la rjes su brtse mdzad khyed kyi thugs //

analyzed: 'jig rten na yod skye bo rnam par bsre ma'i rgyu //
translated: In the world, there is a cause for the mixture of beings,

analyzed: chen po'i rdul dang nyung ngu'i rdul nyid ldan pa'o //
translated: which is the possession of great and small particles.

original: thub pa srid pa'i mtsho las rang nyid rab rgal nas //
analyzed: thub pa srid pa'i mtsho las rang nyid rab rgal nas //
translated: O Sage, having crossed over the ocean of existence yourself,🔽please pull out the suffering beings!

analyzed: 'gro ba sdug bsngal byid ba rab tu drongs mdzod cig / legs pa'i dbang phyug gis ni phun sum tshogs pa thob nas bzhin //
translated: Just as the Lord of Goodness, having attained perfection,

original: gzhan rnams la yang rang gi yon tan gyis sbyor mdzod //
analyzed: gzhan rnams la yang rang gi yon tan gyis sbyor mdzod //
translated: applied his own qualities to others as well,

original: don mkhyen 'di na'i don dang pha rol du 'am gang //
analyzed: don mkhyen 'di na'i don dang pha rol du 'am gang //
translated: you, who know the meaning of this, should apply yourself to the meaning of the other.

original: skye bo kha cig 'di na bdag gi phan pa byed //
analyzed: skye bo kha cig 'di na bdag gi phan pa byed //
translated: Some people here are helpful to oneself,

original: gang zhig 'jig rten dge ba'i ched du rab zhugs de //
analyzed: gang zhig 'jig rten dge ba'i ched du rab zhugs de //
translated: but those who enter the world for the sake of virtue

analyzed: mi yi 'jig rten dang ni mtho ris su rnyed dka' //
translated: “It is difficult to find in the human world and in the heavens.

original: de ltar drang srong che la tshig 'di gsol nas ni //
analyzed: de ltar drang srong che la tshig 'di gsol nas ni //
translated: ” Having spoken these words to the great sage,

original: lha na gnas pa de gnyis ji ltar 'ongs par gshegs //
analyzed: lha na gnas pa de gnyis ji ltar 'ongs par gshegs //
translated: those two gods departed as they had come.

original: thub pa yis kyang de yi tshig de rab mnod nas //
analyzed: thub pa yis kyang de yi tshig de rab mnod nas //
translated: The Sage, having accepted those words,

original: 'gro ba rnam par thar @55b phyir nges par rgyas par mdzad //🔽de nas bsod snyoms dus su phyogs bzhir drang srong la //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnam par thar @55b phyir nges par rgyas par mdzad // de nas bsod snyoms dus su phyogs bzhir drang srong la //
translated: definitely expanded (the Dharma) for the sake of the liberation of beings.🔽Then, at the time of the alms round, the gods in the heavens

original: lha na gnas pas lhung bzed rnams ni phul ba ste //
analyzed: lha na gnas pas lhung bzed rnams ni phul ba ste //
translated: offered the bowls to the sages in the four directions.

original: goo ta mas bzhi po de rnams rab bzhes nas //
analyzed: goo ta mas bzhi po de rnams rab bzhes nas //
translated: Gautama accepted all four of them,

original: de yi chos kyi ched du gcig nyid mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de yi chos kyi ched du gcig nyid mdzad pa'o //
translated: but made one for the sake of his Dharma.

translated: Then, at that time, the two merchants, having gone with purpose,🔽encouraged by the gods through friendship,🔽first made an offering of alms to the great sage with a vast mind,

original: dga' ba dang ldan phyag byas nas ni bsod snyoms phul //
analyzed: dga' ba dang ldan phyag byas nas ni bsod snyoms phul //

original: rtsibs 'phur dang ni rangs byed bu ste de gnyis ni //
analyzed: rtsibs 'phur dang ni rangs byed bu ste de gnyis ni //

analyzed: chos 'dzin nus pa'i blo gros thub pas gzigs pa ste //
translated: the Sage saw that they had the intelligence to grasp the Dharma.

original: de gnyis lha na gshegs par thugs kyis mngon gzigs nas //
analyzed: de gnyis lha na gshegs par thugs kyis mngon gzigs nas //
translated: He saw with his mind that they had gone to the gods,

analyzed: dge slong lnga po rnams la thugs kyis gshegs pa'o //

original: de nas zhi ba'i gdams pa las ni goo ta mas //
analyzed: de nas zhi ba'i gdams pa las ni goo ta mas //
translated: Then, with the instruction of peace, Gautama

analyzed: 'jigs byed shing rtas bsnyen pa'i grong khyer dge bar gshegs //
translated: and has various forests and groves.

analyzed: de nas khyu mchog 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' glang chen myos pa'i 'gros ldan pa //

analyzed: 'gro ba mngon par rnam par 'dus phyir ka shis la gshegs bzhed pa //

analyzed: glang chen bzhin du rang gi sku lus ma lus phyir la rab log nas //

analyzed: thub pas spyan mig mi 'dzums par ni byang chub shing gi rtsa bar gzigs //
translated: The Sage, with unclosed eyes, beheld the foot of the Bodhi tree.

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las /
translated: In the great poem called Buddhacarita

original: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o /
translated: The Fourteenth Canto, The Attainment of Buddhahood

original: // / zhi zhing mdangs ldan mdzad pa kun nas brnyes pa de //
analyzed: // / zhi zhing mdangs ldan mdzad pa kun nas brnyes pa de //
translated: The One who had attained the state of peace and splendor

original: gcig pur rab gshegs mang po dang ni thabs cig bzhin //
analyzed: gcig pur rab gshegs mang po dang ni thabs cig bzhin //
translated: went alone, as if accompanied by a multitude.

original: lam na dge slong chos ldan kha cig gis mthong nas //
analyzed: lam na dge slong chos ldan kha cig gis mthong nas //
translated: Some monks, who were virtuous, saw him on the road

original: ya mtshan dang bcas thal mor bcas pas 'di skad gsol //
analyzed: ya mtshan dang bcas thal mor bcas pas 'di skad gsol //
translated: and, with astonishment and with folded hands, they said this:

original: dbang po'i rta ni g-yo bar dbang po'i rta thul zhing //
analyzed: dbang po'i rta ni g-yo bar dbang po'i rta thul zhing //
translated: You who have tamed the horse of the senses, which is restless,

original: sems can chags rnams ji ltar chags ma gyur //
analyzed: sems can chags rnams ji ltar chags ma gyur //
translated: how is it that you are not attached to beings who are attached?

original: shin tu ro ldan gsar pa'i shes rab ro yis ni //
analyzed: shin tu ro ldan gsar pa'i shes rab ro yis ni //
translated: Those who are satisfied with the taste of the fresh wisdom of the Sugata,

original: ri bong gis mtshon dang mtshungs tshim par gyur pa rnams //
analyzed: ri bong gis mtshon dang mtshungs tshim par gyur pa rnams //
translated: are like the rabbit and the moon.

original: brtan pa khyod kyi zhal ni ji ltar rab rgyas shing //
analyzed: brtan pa khyod kyi zhal ni ji ltar rab rgyas shing //
translated: How is it that your face, O Steadfast One, is so radiant?

original: 'dir ni dbang po rnams kyi dbang phyug mdzad pa ste //
analyzed: 'dir ni dbang po rnams kyi dbang phyug mdzad pa ste //
translated: Here you are the lord of the senses,

original: khyu mchog chen @56a * //🔽po'i spyan mnga' nges par don mdzad cing //
analyzed: khyu mchog chen @56a * // po'i spyan mnga' nges par don mdzad cing //
translated: you are the one who has the eyes of the great bull,🔽you are the one who has accomplished the purpose.

original: khyod kyi bla ma su lags gang las grub ba gsungs //
analyzed: khyod kyi bla ma su lags gang las grub ba gsungs //
translated: Who is your teacher? Who did you study with?

original: de rnams la des smras pa bdag la ston ba med //
analyzed: de rnams la des smras pa bdag la ston ba med //
translated: He said to them, “I have no teacher.

original: bdag la mchod bya med cing smad bya su yang med //
analyzed: bdag la mchod bya med cing smad bya su yang med //
translated: I have no one to worship and no one to despise.

original: mya ngan 'das pa thob cing gzhan rnams dang mi mnyam ;
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa thob cing gzhan rnams dang mi mnyam ;
translated: I have attained nirvana and am not the same as others.

original: / bdag ni chos la rang byung du ni shes par mdzod //🔽gang phyir gzhan rnams kyis ma rtogs pa'i rtogs bya ni //
analyzed: / bdag ni chos la rang byung du ni shes par mdzod // gang phyir gzhan rnams kyis ma rtogs pa'i rtogs bya ni //
translated: Know that I am self-arisen with respect to the Dharma.🔽Because I have realized all that is to be realized that others have not realized,

original: bdag gis mtha' dag rtogs pa de phyir sangs rgyas te //
analyzed: bdag gis mtha' dag rtogs pa de phyir sangs rgyas te //
translated: therefore I am a buddha.

original: gang phyir bdag gi nyon mongs rnams ni dgra bzhin 'pham //
analyzed: gang phyir bdag gi nyon mongs rnams ni dgra bzhin 'pham //
translated: Because I have defeated my afflictions as if they were enemies,

original: de phyir zhi ba dag ni kun nas shes bar mdzod //
analyzed: de phyir zhi ba dag ni kun nas shes bar mdzod //
translated: therefore I am known as the one who has completely pacified.

original: sdug bsngal rnams kyis nyam thag grogs la phan don du //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rnams kyis nyam thag grogs la phan don du //
translated: For the sake of helping my friends who are distressed by suffering,

original: zhi ba kho bo 'di yang b'a r'a na s'ir 'gro //
analyzed: zhi ba kho bo 'di yang b'a r'a na s'ir 'gro //
translated: I, the peaceful one, will go to Varanasi.

original: der ni 'chi med chos kyi rnga dag rdung ba ste //
analyzed: der ni 'chi med chos kyi rnga dag rdung ba ste //
translated: There I beat the drum of the deathless Dharma,

original: snyan grags bde ba'i phyir min nga rgyal phyir ma yin //
analyzed: snyan grags bde ba'i phyir min nga rgyal phyir ma yin //
translated: not for the sake of fame or happiness, not for the sake of pride.

original: rgal bas 'gro ba rnams ni rgal bar 'gyur bgyi zhing //
analyzed: rgal bas 'gro ba rnams ni rgal bar 'gyur bgyi zhing //
translated: Those who have crossed over should help beings to cross over,

original: grol bas sems can rnams ni yongs su thar bar bgyi //
analyzed: grol bas sems can rnams ni yongs su thar bar bgyi //
translated: those who have been liberated should liberate beings.

original: de ltar gson pa'i 'jig rten nyam thag par mthong nas //
analyzed: de ltar gson pa'i 'jig rten nyam thag par mthong nas //
translated: Seeing the world of the living in such distress,

original: sngon du bdag gi dam bca' 'di ni gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sngon du bdag gi dam bca' 'di ni gyur pa'o //
translated: I have made this vow:

original: 'di na kha cig nor ni thob nas bdag nyid ni //🔽gcig tu nyid kyang 'dzin par byed pa ngo mtshar cing //
analyzed: 'di na kha cig nor ni thob nas bdag nyid ni // gcig tu nyid kyang 'dzin par byed pa ngo mtshar cing //
translated: Here some, having obtained wealth,🔽are stingy with it.🔽It is amazing that they do not give even a glance

original: skye po chen po ma btsums mig la gang gis kyang //🔽khyad 'phags thob nas rnam par 'dzin pa de don yin //
analyzed: skye po chen po ma btsums mig la gang gis kyang // khyad 'phags thob nas rnam par 'dzin pa de don yin //
translated: to the great being who has come to them.

original: gang zhig skam la gnas pas mi ni chus khyer ba //
analyzed: gang zhig skam la gnas pas mi ni chus khyer ba //
translated: He who, while standing on dry land, is carried away by the water,

original: 'dren par 'dod min de ni legs pa'i gzugs ma yin //
analyzed: 'dren par 'dod min de ni legs pa'i gzugs ma yin //
translated: is not a leader, he is not a good person.

original: gang zhig gter ni thob nas skye bo dbul po la //
analyzed: gang zhig gter ni thob nas skye bo dbul po la //
translated: He who, having obtained a treasure,

original: nor gyi sbyor ba med pa de ni sbyang po min //
analyzed: nor gyi sbyor ba med pa de ni sbyang po min //
translated: He who is without the application of wealth is not a teacher.

original: rang bzhin gnas pas nad kyis mngon par bcom pa la //
analyzed: rang bzhin gnas pas nad kyis mngon par bcom pa la //
translated: One who is overcome by the manifest disease of the natural state

original: lag tu song ba'i sman gyis gso bar rigs pa ste //
analyzed: lag tu song ba'i sman gyis gso bar rigs pa ste //
translated: is to be healed by the medicine that is in his hand.

original: de ltar lam ngan song ba'i ched du lam dag ni //
analyzed: de ltar lam ngan song ba'i ched du lam dag ni //
translated: In the same way, the path that is to be taught by the path🔽that is certain to be taken by those who have gone to the lower realms

original: nges par byad ba'i lam gyis bshad par 'thad pa yin //
analyzed: nges par byad ba'i lam gyis bshad par 'thad pa yin //
translated: is the path that is to be taken by those who have gone to the lower realms.

original: ji ltar sgron ma rab tu gsal bar byed pa ste //
analyzed: ji ltar sgron ma rab tu gsal bar byed pa ste //
translated: Just as a lamp is made to shine

original: de yi rgyu can dmar por 'gro ba ma yin nyid //
analyzed: de yi rgyu can dmar por 'gro ba ma yin nyid //
translated: and its redness is not made to go,

original: de bzhin sangs rgyas nyid kyis ye shes rab gsal bar //
analyzed: de bzhin sangs rgyas nyid kyis ye shes rab gsal bar //
translated: in the same way, the wisdom of buddhahood is made to shine

original: mdzad de de phyir chags par 'gro ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mdzad de de phyir chags par 'gro ba ma yin no //
translated: and its attachment is not made to go.

original: ji ltar shing rnams la ni me dag nges pa dang // mkha' la rlung dang sa la chu ni nges pa ste //
analyzed: ji ltar shing rnams la ni me dag nges pa dang // mkha' la rlung dang sa la chu ni nges pa ste //
translated: Just as fire is certain in wood, wind in space, and water in the earth,

original: de bzhin @56b gang yang rnams su thub pa rnams kyis ni //
analyzed: de bzhin @56b gang yang rnams su thub pa rnams kyis ni //
translated: in the same way, in all places, the sages

original: byang chub nges shing k'a shi rnams dang chos smra des //
analyzed: byang chub nges shing k'a shi rnams dang chos smra des //
translated: are certain in enlightenment, the Kāśis, and the dharmabhāṇakas.

original: de nas nye bar 'ongs nas aa la la zhes pa //
analyzed: de nas nye bar 'ongs nas aa la la zhes pa //
translated: Then, having approached, they exclaimed, “Ah!

original: rnam par brjod nas ji ltar 'dod bzhin rab spangs nas //
analyzed: rnam par brjod nas ji ltar 'dod bzhin rab spangs nas //
translated: Having described them, they abandoned them as they wished,

original: yang dang yang du ya mtshan mig ni g-yo ba yis //
analyzed: yang dang yang du ya mtshan mig ni g-yo ba yis //
translated: And again and again, with eyes of wonder,

original: re 'dod skyes shing sangs rgyas la ni lta bzhin song //
analyzed: re 'dod skyes shing sangs rgyas la ni lta bzhin song //
translated: They went, gazing at the Buddha, their hopes fulfilled.

original: de nas thub pas rim gyis k'a si'i grod khyer ni //
analyzed: de nas thub pas rim gyis k'a si'i grod khyer ni //
translated: Then the Sage gradually saw the city of Kāsi

original: nor gnas snying po dang ni rab mtshungs gzigs pa ste //
analyzed: nor gnas snying po dang ni rab mtshungs gzigs pa ste //
translated: Resembling the essence of a treasure-house,

original: grogs mo bzhin du 'khyud nas yang dag 'dus pa ni //
analyzed: grogs mo bzhin du 'khyud nas yang dag 'dus pa ni //
translated: Embraced and gathered by its friends,

original: skal ldan shing rta dang ni b'a r'a na s'i nyid //
analyzed: skal ldan shing rta dang ni b'a r'a na s'i nyid //
translated: The fortunate chariot and Vārāṇasī itself.

original: mthu dang gzi brjid dag gis mngon par mdzes pa des //
analyzed: mthu dang gzi brjid dag gis mngon par mdzes pa des //
translated: That city, resplendent with power and majesty,

original: khu byug rnams kyis sgra sgrogs shing gi tshogs ldan zhing //
analyzed: khu byug rnams kyis sgra sgrogs shing gi tshogs ldan zhing //
translated: With flocks of trees resounding with the calls of cuckoos,

original: drang srod chen pos bsnyen pa'i ri dags nags nyid du //
analyzed: drang srod chen pos bsnyen pa'i ri dags nags nyid du //
translated: In the very forest of deer approached by the great sage,

original: rnam par mdzes pas nyi ma bzhin du rab 'thob po //
analyzed: rnam par mdzes pas nyi ma bzhin du rab 'thob po //
translated: Was made beautiful by the sun-like one.🔽Koṇḍinya, then Mahānāman,

original: koondi n+ya'i rigs dang de nas ming chen dang // rlangs pa dang ni rta thul de bzhin bzang rgyal te //
analyzed: koondi n+ya'i rigs dang de nas ming chen dang // rlangs pa dang ni rta thul de bzhin bzang rgyal te //
translated: Bhadrika, Aśvajit, and Bhadriya,

original: dge slong lnga yis de ni rgyang ring nas gzigs nas //
analyzed: dge slong lnga yis de ni rgyang ring nas gzigs nas //
translated: The five monks saw him from a distance,

original: phan tshun du ni tshig 'di smras par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: phan tshun du ni tshig 'di smras par gyur pa'o //
translated: and they said to each other:

original: bde ba'i bdag nyid dge slong goo ta ma 'di //
analyzed: bde ba'i bdag nyid dge slong goo ta ma 'di //
translated: “This monk Gautama, who has the nature of happiness,

original: dka' thub de las phyir log mngon par 'ongs pa ste //🔽mngon du 'gro bya ma yin nges par phyag 'os min //
analyzed: dka' thub de las phyir log mngon par 'ongs pa ste // mngon du 'gro bya ma yin nges par phyag 'os min //
translated: has turned back from that asceticism and has come here.🔽He is not to be approached, he is certainly not to be bowed to,

original: dam bca' bcom pa mchod par 'os pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dam bca' bcom pa mchod par 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: he has broken his vow, he is not worthy of offerings.

original: de ni brgya la gal te sdod par 'dod gyur na //
analyzed: de ni brgya la gal te sdod par 'dod gyur na //
translated: If he should wish to stay here for any reason,

original: de nyid la ni gtam 'di rab tu gsol mdzod da da //🔽'gron po nye bar 'ongs pa gang dang su la ni //
analyzed: de nyid la ni gtam 'di rab tu gsol mdzod da da // 'gron po nye bar 'ongs pa gang dang su la ni //
translated: then let us speak to him about this matter.

original: 'phags pa rnams kyis mi byed par ni 'os ma yin //
analyzed: 'phags pa rnams kyis mi byed par ni 'os ma yin //
translated: It is not right for the noble ones not to do🔽what is to be done for any guest who has come near.”

original: de ltar bya ba byas nas dge slong de rnams ni //
analyzed: de ltar bya ba byas nas dge slong de rnams ni //
translated: Having done what was to be done, those monks

original: nye bar gnas pa'i nye bar sangs rgyas gshegs pa ste //
analyzed: nye bar gnas pa'i nye bar sangs rgyas gshegs pa ste //
translated: approached the Buddha who was staying nearby.

original: ji lta ji ltar de rnams la ni nye bar gshegs //
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar de rnams la ni nye bar gshegs //
translated: The more they approached him,

original: de lta de ltar de rnams dam bca' nyams par gyur //
analyzed: de lta de ltar de rnams dam bca' nyams par gyur //
translated: the more their vow was broken.

original: de nas kha cig 'di yi na bza' blangs pa ste //
analyzed: de nas kha cig 'di yi na bza' blangs pa ste //
translated: Then some took his robe,

original: de bzhin gzhan ni phyag 'tshal nas ni lhung bzed bzung //
analyzed: de bzhin gzhan ni phyag 'tshal nas ni lhung bzed bzung //
translated: and others, having bowed down, took his bowl.

original: kha cig 'di la 'os pa'i gdan ni phul ba ste //
analyzed: kha cig 'di la 'os pa'i gdan ni phul ba ste //
translated: Some offered him a seat suitable for him,

original: de bzhin gzhan gnyis zhabs bsil nye bar phul pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gzhan gnyis zhabs bsil nye bar phul pa'o //
translated: and two others offered him water for his feet.

original: de ltar rab byed mchod pa mang po ldan pa rnams //
analyzed: de ltar rab byed mchod pa mang po ldan pa rnams //
translated: Thus, in many ways, they made offerings to him,

original: 'di la thams cad kyis ni bla mar spyod pa byas //
analyzed: 'di la thams cad kyis ni bla mar spyod pa byas //
translated: and all of them served him with respect.

original: rigs su mngon brjod de rnams kyis kyang ma spangs shing //
analyzed: rigs su mngon brjod de rnams kyis kyang ma spangs shing //
translated: But he did not abandon his former caste,

original: de rnams la rjes brtse bcas @57a * //
analyzed: de rnams la rjes brtse bcas @57a * //
translated: and he continued to have affection for them.

original: bcom ldan gyis smras pa //🔽mchod 'os dgra bcom la ni gus pa ma yin pas //
analyzed: bcom ldan gyis smras pa // mchod 'os dgra bcom la ni gus pa ma yin pas //
translated: The Blessed One said:🔽“Do not speak, monks, about the former conduct of the venerable Ājñāta­kauṇḍinya, who is worthy of offerings and an arhat.

original: sngar gyi spyod pas dge slong rnams kye ma smra shig / bstod dang smad pa nges par bdag gis mnyam pa ste //
analyzed: sngar gyi spyod pas dge slong rnams kye ma smra shig / bstod dang smad pa nges par bdag gis mnyam pa ste //
translated: I am indifferent to praise and blame,

original: khyed rnams bsod nams min las rnam par bzlog par bgyi //
analyzed: khyed rnams bsod nams min las rnam par bzlog par bgyi //
translated: and I will turn you away from demerit.

original: sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa'i ched du sangs rgyas shing //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa'i ched du sangs rgyas shing //
translated: The Buddha has become a Buddha for the sake of benefiting the world.

original: 'byung po kun la phan pas rab tu zhugs pa la //
analyzed: 'byung po kun la phan pas rab tu zhugs pa la //
translated: He is engaged in benefiting all beings.

original: bla ma nye bar 'joms las ming gis gang smras de //
analyzed: bla ma nye bar 'joms las ming gis gang smras de //
translated: He who is called by the name of the one who conquers the guru

original: ma rungs pa yi pha ma bzhin du chos 'chad do //
analyzed: ma rungs pa yi pha ma bzhin du chos 'chad do //
translated: teaches the Dharma like a wicked father and mother.

original: de ltar drang srong chen po'i thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: de ltar drang srong chen po'i thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
translated: Thus, the great sage, whose nature is compassion,

original: smra ba rnams kyi mchog gis de skad gsungs pa ste //
analyzed: smra ba rnams kyi mchog gis de skad gsungs pa ste //
translated: the supreme speaker, spoke in this way.

original: rmongs las snying po med pas chud zos de rnams kyis //
analyzed: rmongs las snying po med pas chud zos de rnams kyis //
translated: Those who are deluded, who waste their lives without essence,

original: gdong ni cung zad bzhad pa dang ldan rgol ba smras pa'o //🔽goo ta me re zhig dka' thub mchog dang ni //
analyzed: gdong ni cung zad bzhad pa dang ldan rgol ba smras pa'o // goo ta me re zhig dka' thub mchog dang ni //
translated: with a slightly smiling face, spoke this objection:🔽“Gautama, for the time being, you have not realized the truth

original: dam pa de yis de nyid rtogs pa ma yin te //
analyzed: dam pa de yis de nyid rtogs pa ma yin te //
translated: through that supreme and holy austerity.

original: don ni dga' bas bsgrub bya bde bas gnas pa'o //
analyzed: don ni dga' bas bsgrub bya bde bas gnas pa'o //
translated: The goal is to abide in bliss through the practice of joy.

original: khyed kyis mthong zhes bya ba 'dir ni gtan tshigs gang //
analyzed: khyed kyis mthong zhes bya ba 'dir ni gtan tshigs gang //
translated: What is the reason here for saying ‘you have seen’?

original: gang tshe de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de nyid la //
analyzed: gang tshe de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de nyid la //
translated: When the truth of the Tathāgatas is like this,

original: de nas dge slong de rnams dang par gyur min te //
analyzed: de nas dge slong de rnams dang par gyur min te //
translated: then those bhikṣus are not beginners.

original: byang chub pa yi lam ni de las gzhan du shes //
analyzed: byang chub pa yi lam ni de las gzhan du shes //
translated: The path to enlightenment is known as other than that.

original: de nas lam mkhyen pa yis lam ni bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: de nas lam mkhyen pa yis lam ni bka' stsal pa //
translated: Then, knowing the path, the path was taught:

original: byis pa'i skye bo bdag nyid ngal bar ldan pa dang // dbang po'i spyod yul rnams la de bzhin chags pa ste //
analyzed: byis pa'i skye bo bdag nyid ngal bar ldan pa dang // dbang po'i spyod yul rnams la de bzhin chags pa ste //
translated: “The childish, the weary, and likewise the attached to the objects of the senses,

original: 'chi ba med pa'i lung gis lam ma yin pa'i phyogs //
analyzed: 'chi ba med pa'i lung gis lam ma yin pa'i phyogs //
translated: By the transmission of deathlessness, the non-path direction,🔽Look to those two with faults.

original: skyon dang ldan pa gnyis po de la ltos mdzod cig / gdung bar mngon par brjod pa'i lus kyi ngal rnams kyis //
analyzed: skyon dang ldan pa gnyis po de la ltos mdzod cig / gdung bar mngon par brjod pa'i lus kyi ngal rnams kyis //
translated: By the weariness of the body, expressed as torment,

original: yongs su 'khrugs shing rnam par gnod pa'i sems la ni //
analyzed: yongs su 'khrugs shing rnam par gnod pa'i sems la ni //
translated: The mind, agitated and harmed,

original: 'jig rten tha snyad kyang ni brgyal shes min na //
analyzed: 'jig rten tha snyad kyang ni brgyal shes min na //
translated: Does not know even worldly conventions,

original: dbang po las 'das de nyid lam ni kye ma ci //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das de nyid lam ni kye ma ci //
translated: Let alone the path beyond the senses, thatness.

original: ji ltar sgron mas mtshan mo'i mun pa nyams pa ru //
analyzed: ji ltar sgron mas mtshan mo'i mun pa nyams pa ru //
translated: Just as a lamp destroys the darkness of night,

original: 'dir ni mngon par nyer 'gro chu rnams gtor bas min //
analyzed: 'dir ni mngon par nyer 'gro chu rnams gtor bas min //
translated: Here, it is not by the destruction of the water that approaches.

original: de bzhin ye shes mi yis mi shes mun pa ni //
analyzed: de bzhin ye shes mi yis mi shes mun pa ni //
translated: In the same way, the darkness of ignorance of humans

original: nyams par sngon 'gro lus kyi ngal ba rnams kyis min //
analyzed: nyams par sngon 'gro lus kyi ngal ba rnams kyis min //
translated: Not by the toils of the body, which are useless for the attainment of the goal.

original: ji ltar me ni 'dod pas shing la 'bigs pa dang // rnam par 'gems pas me ni thob pa ma yin la //
analyzed: ji ltar me ni 'dod pas shing la 'bigs pa dang // rnam par 'gems pas me ni thob pa ma yin la //
translated: Fire is not produced by the mere desire to have it, by the mere wish to burn wood;

original: de nyid mngon pa'i thabs las bsrubs pas thob pa ste //
analyzed: de nyid mngon pa'i thabs las bsrubs pas thob pa ste //
translated: but it is produced by the appropriate means, by rubbing the pieces of wood together.

original: de bzhin sbyor las 'chi @57b ba med thob ngal bas min //
analyzed: de bzhin sbyor las 'chi @57b ba med thob ngal bas min //
translated: In the same way, immortality is not attained by mere effort, but by the appropriate means.

original: de ltar don med 'dod pa rnams la chags pa ni //
analyzed: de ltar don med 'dod pa rnams la chags pa ni //
translated: Thus, those who are attached to useless desires,

original: rdul dang mun pa dag gis zil non sems ldan rnams //
analyzed: rdul dang mun pa dag gis zil non sems ldan rnams //
translated: who are overwhelmed by the dust and darkness of the passions,

original: bstan bcos don la nus kyang grub pa thob min na //
analyzed: bstan bcos don la nus kyang grub pa thob min na //
translated: even if they are capable of understanding the meaning of the treatises, do not attain perfection.

original: chags bral 'gog pa'i cho ga la ni sngon nyid do //
analyzed: chags bral 'gog pa'i cho ga la ni sngon nyid do //
translated: They are stopped by the rules of detachment, as if by a prior prohibition.

original: ji ltar nad kyis mngon par bcom pa'i srog chags kyis //
analyzed: ji ltar nad kyis mngon par bcom pa'i srog chags kyis //
translated: Just as a sick person, overcome by illness,

original: de bzhin mi shes nad kyis mngon par bcom pa yi //
analyzed: de bzhin mi shes nad kyis mngon par bcom pa yi //
translated: in the same way, those who are overcome by the illness of ignorance,

original: 'dod pa rnams la chags pa'i zhi ba gang las so //
analyzed: 'dod pa rnams la chags pa'i zhi ba gang las so //

analyzed: ji ltar skam pa'i rten la gnas pa'i rlung gis ni //

analyzed: bus pa'i me yi zhi ba yod pa ma yin no //

original: de bzhin 'dod pa'i rten la gnas pa'i chags pa yis //
analyzed: de bzhin 'dod pa'i rten la gnas pa'i chags pa yis //
translated: In the same way, the mind that is attached to the objects of desire

original: rjes su song ba'i sems kyi zhi ba yod ma yin //
analyzed: rjes su song ba'i sems kyi zhi ba yod ma yin //

original: mtha' 'di gnyis po dag kyang rnam par dor byas nas //
analyzed: mtha' 'di gnyis po dag kyang rnam par dor byas nas //

original: bdag gis lam gzhan dbu mas lhag par rtogs pa ste //
analyzed: bdag gis lam gzhan dbu mas lhag par rtogs pa ste //

analyzed: shin tu sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'i 'dren pa po //

original: bde ba dang ni dge ba nyid dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba dang ni dge ba nyid dang bral ba'o //

original: yang dag lta ba'i nyi mas rab tu gsal byas shing //
analyzed: yang dag lta ba'i nyi mas rab tu gsal byas shing //

original: rnam dag yang dag rtogs pa'i shing rtas drangs pa ste //
analyzed: rnam dag yang dag rtogs pa'i shing rtas drangs pa ste //
translated: drawn by the chariot of pure right understanding,

original: yang dag brjod pa'i yang dag dag ni gtsug lag khang //
analyzed: yang dag brjod pa'i yang dag dag ni gtsug lag khang //

original: dge ba'i bya ba'i skyed tshal brgya phrag mngon par dga' //
analyzed: dge ba'i bya ba'i skyed tshal brgya phrag mngon par dga' //

original: smad pa med pa'i 'tsho ba lo legs chen po ste //
analyzed: smad pa med pa'i 'tsho ba lo legs chen po ste //

original: yang dag rtsol bas stobs rab rjes su 'gro ba can //
analyzed: yang dag rtsol bas stobs rab rjes su 'gro ba can //

original: kun du yang dag dran pa'i sbas pas sbas pa ste //
analyzed: kun du yang dag dran pa'i sbas pas sbas pa ste //

analyzed: ting 'dzin gzims mal dang ni gdan dang khyab pa yis //
translated: The one that is the bed and seat of samādhi is the one that pervades.

analyzed: de ltar mchog gi yan lag brgyad 'dir 'di lam ste //

original: 'chi dang rga dang na ba rnams las 'dren pa po //
analyzed: 'chi dang rga dang na ba rnams las 'dren pa po //

analyzed: gang la drangs nas bya ba thams cad byas pa ste //

analyzed: 'di dang che ge mor ni slan chad 'gro ba med //

analyzed: 'di ni sdug bsngal mtha' dag 'di ni mtshan ma ste //

analyzed: rnam par mthar phyin bdag gi spyan mig skye ba'o //

analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs sdug bsngal 'di ni yongs su 'thob //

analyzed: 'dod pa'i bdag can gyi 'am bdag rgyal can gyi 'am // lus @58a * //

analyzed: can gyi 'am yang na lus can ma yin pa'i //

analyzed: gang zhig yon tan med pa gang la rab zhugs kyang //

original: mdor bsdus nas de sdug bsngal du ni shes par mdzod //
analyzed: mdor bsdus nas de sdug bsngal du ni shes par mdzod //

original: de ltar 'bar ba zhi ba'i me ni chung na yang //
analyzed: de ltar 'bar ba zhi ba'i me ni chung na yang //
translated: Thus, even a small fire, if it is burning,

original: lhan cig skyes pa dro ba'i ngo bo spong min nyid //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa dro ba'i ngo bo spong min nyid //

original: de bzhin bdag tu 'du shes zhi sogs kyis phra yang //
analyzed: de bzhin bdag tu 'du shes zhi sogs kyis phra yang //
translated: In the same way, even though the notion of self is subtle,

original: sdug bsngal bdag nyid can zhes bdag gi shin tu nges //
analyzed: sdug bsngal bdag nyid can zhes bdag gi shin tu nges //

original: ji ltar sa chu sa bon dus rnams myu gu'i bzhin //
analyzed: ji ltar sa chu sa bon dus rnams myu gu'i bzhin //

analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs rnam pa sna tshogs skyon rnams dang // skyon las rab tu skyes pa'i las rnams nyid dag ni //

original: sdug bsngal dag gi rgyur ni nges par shes par mdzod //
analyzed: sdug bsngal dag gi rgyur ni nges par shes par mdzod //

analyzed: mtho ris su 'am 'og tu srid pa'i rgyun las ni //

analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs skyon gyi tshogs rnams rgyu yin zhing //

original: dman dang 'bring dang mchog ste sna tshogs nyid kyi ni //
analyzed: dman dang 'bring dang mchog ste sna tshogs nyid kyi ni //

original: de dang der ni las rnams dag ni rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: de dang der ni las rnams dag ni rtsa ba'o //

original: nyes pa zad las 'khor ba'i rgyun ni yod min te //
analyzed: nyes pa zad las 'khor ba'i rgyun ni yod min te //

original: las zad pa las sdug bsngal de ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: las zad pa las sdug bsngal de ni yod ma yin //

original: gang phyir don gang yong pa las ni kun 'byung ste //
analyzed: gang phyir don gang yong pa las ni kun 'byung ste //

original: de phyir med pa las te slar yang 'byung ba med //
analyzed: de phyir med pa las te slar yang 'byung ba med //

original: gang du skye ba med cing rga med 'chi ba med //
analyzed: gang du skye ba med cing rga med 'chi ba med //

original: me med sa med chu med mkha' med rlung med la //
analyzed: me med sa med chu med mkha' med rlung med la //

analyzed: thog ma bar dang mtha' med 'phags pa dbrog bya min //

original: dge zhing 'gyur med 'gog pa de ni shes par mdzod //
analyzed: dge zhing 'gyur med 'gog pa de ni shes par mdzod //

analyzed: yan lag brgyad ldan gang zhig mngon brjod de lam ste //

analyzed: lhag par rtogs phyir 'di yi thabs de'i gzhan ma yin //

analyzed: lam 'di yin na ma mthong ba las 'jig rten rnams //

analyzed: de nyid dang ni nye du rnams ni yongs su 'khor //

analyzed: sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya zhing rgyu 'di ni //

original: de ltar 'di ni bdag gi blo gros rab zhugs so //

original: sdug bsngal 'di ni yongs shes rgyu ni spangs pa ste //
analyzed: sdug bsngal 'di ni yongs shes rgyu ni spangs pa ste //

original: de bzhin du ni 'gog pa mngon du byas pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni 'gog pa mngon du byas pa'o //

original: de bzhin du ni 'di yi lam 'di bsgoms pa ste //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni 'di yi lam 'di bsgoms pa ste //
translated: Likewise, this path is cultivated.

original: de ltar 'dir ni bdag gi spyan mig rab zhugs so //
analyzed: de ltar 'dir ni bdag gi spyan mig rab zhugs so //

original: ji srid du ni yang dag 'phags pa'i bden pa ni //
analyzed: ji srid du ni yang dag 'phags pa'i bden pa ni //

analyzed: bzhi ba'i rkang pa 'di rnams mthong ba ma yin pa //

analyzed: bdag nyid la ni don byas nyid du yang ma @58b mthong ;

original: / gang tshe 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rtogs pa ste //
analyzed: / gang tshe 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rtogs pa ste //

analyzed: rtogs byas kyang ni dor byar 'os pa byas pa'o //

analyzed: de tshe bdag 'dir rnam par grol zhes brjod pa ste //

analyzed: bdag nyid la ni don byas nyid du yang mthong ngo //

analyzed: de ltar drang srong chen po thugs rje mnga' ba yis //

analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o /

analyzed: // / de nas thams cad mkhyen pa yis //

analyzed: me dang rab mtshungs ngus kyi me yis 'jig rten 'di //
translated: The suffering of the humans is like the suffering of a wound.🔽The suffering of

original: chags bral rnams kyi dgon par yang dag gnas kyang ngam //
analyzed: chags bral rnams kyi dgon par yang dag gnas kyang ngam //
translated: Even if they dwell in the forest, free from attachment,

original: lus med rnams kyis srid rtser yang dag gnas na yang //
analyzed: lus med rnams kyis srid rtser yang dag gnas na yang //
translated: Or even if they dwell at the peak of existence, bodiless,

original: nags sam lha na de nyid mthong min ma yin la //
analyzed: nags sam lha na de nyid mthong min ma yin la //
translated: They do not see reality, whether in the forest or among the gods.

original: khyim na gnas pa yin yang lta bas dge legs gyur //
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa yin yang lta bas dge legs gyur //
translated: But even if they live at home, they become virtuous through seeing.🔽They are not liberated from the various nets of views,

original: rnam pa sna tshogs lta ba'i dra ba rnams kyis dang ; /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis de rnams rnam mi 'grol //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs lta ba'i dra ba rnams kyis dang ; /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis de rnams rnam mi 'grol //

original: de phyir rab tu nyams shing de nyid ma mthong bar //
analyzed: de phyir rab tu nyams shing de nyid ma mthong bar //
translated: Therefore, having fallen away and not seen reality,

original: chags pa rnam par bsal nas khyad par 'phags par gshegs //
analyzed: chags pa rnam par bsal nas khyad par 'phags par gshegs //
translated: They go to a higher realm, having cleared away attachment.

original: lta ba legs skyes des ni lta ba ngan de rnams //
analyzed: lta ba legs skyes des ni lta ba ngan de rnams //
translated: That good view of theirs abandons those bad views,

original: ston ka'i sprin gyis rdo yi char bzhin spangs pa ste //
analyzed: ston ka'i sprin gyis rdo yi char bzhin spangs pa ste //
translated: Like autumn clouds dispel a stone rain.

original: dbang phyug la sogs mi mthun rgyu las ma yin zhing //
analyzed: dbang phyug la sogs mi mthun rgyu las ma yin zhing //
translated: They do not come from a cause that is not concordant, such as Īśvara,

original: des ni 'jig rten rgyu med par min zhes rtogs so //
analyzed: des ni 'jig rten rgyu med par min zhes rtogs so //
translated: And they do not come from the world without a cause.

original: de phyir mi mnyam rgyur ni 'thad pa ma yin zhing //
analyzed: de phyir mi mnyam rgyur ni 'thad pa ma yin zhing //
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable that he is the cause of inequality.

original: rgyu med par ni 'gal ba chen po yod pa nyid //
analyzed: rgyu med par ni 'gal ba chen po yod pa nyid //
translated: And if he is not the cause, then there is a great contradiction.

original: 'dir yang rigs pa shes pas so sor mthong ba ste //
analyzed: 'dir yang rigs pa shes pas so sor mthong ba ste //
translated: Here, one sees with the knowledge of reasoning,

original: the tshom med pas de nyid mthong ba kye ma ci //
analyzed: the tshom med pas de nyid mthong ba kye ma ci //
translated: but alas, one sees reality without doubt.

original: gal te dbang phyug gis ni 'gro ba skyed gyur na //
analyzed: gal te dbang phyug gis ni 'gro ba skyed gyur na //
translated: If Īśvara is the creator of the world,

original: 'gro ba rim gyis rab tu 'jug pa ma yin la //
analyzed: 'gro ba rim gyis rab tu 'jug pa ma yin la //
translated: then the world would not function in sequence.

original: skye dgu rnams kyi 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ma yin zhing //
analyzed: skye dgu rnams kyi 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ma yin zhing //
translated: The cycle of life would not be the cycle of life,

original: gang du gang zhig bskyed nas de dang de nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: gang du gang zhig bskyed nas de dang de nyid 'gyur //
translated: and having created this or that, he would become this or that.

original: lus can rnams kyis mi 'dod thob pa ma yin zhing //
analyzed: lus can rnams kyis mi 'dod thob pa ma yin zhing //
translated: It would not be the case that embodied beings obtain what they do not want,

original: de yi bdag nyid rnams kyis 'dod pa'i spyod pa med ;
analyzed: de yi bdag nyid rnams kyis 'dod pa'i spyod pa med ;
translated: and embodied beings would not engage in the conduct they want.

original: / gang zhig lus can rnams kyi dge dang mi dger gyur //
analyzed: / gang zhig lus can rnams kyi dge dang mi dger gyur //
translated: Whatever good and bad fortune embodied beings have

original: de ni dbang phyug nyid phyir dbang phyug la yin no //
analyzed: de ni dbang phyug nyid phyir dbang phyug la yin no //
translated: is due to Īśvara because he is Īśvara.

original: de yi dbang phyug nyid la the tshom 'gyur min zhing //
analyzed: de yi dbang phyug nyid la the tshom 'gyur min zhing //
translated: His Īśvaratva is not in doubt.

original: der ni mi rnams dag gis byams pa pha bzhin 'gyur //
analyzed: der ni mi rnams dag gis byams pa pha bzhin 'gyur //
translated: There, people are as loving as a father.

original: de la nyam thag pas ni smod pa smra min zhing //
analyzed: de la nyam thag pas ni smod pa smra min zhing //
translated: Out of desperation, they do not speak ill of him.

original: lha rnams de dang de la 'jig rten mchod ma yin//
analyzed: lha rnams de dang de la 'jig rten mchod ma yin//
translated: The gods do not worship him in this world.

original: gal te 'di mi bskyed la dgongs par gyur na ni //
analyzed: gal te 'di mi bskyed la dgongs par gyur na ni //
translated: If he is not the creator, then he is not God.

original: bya ldan nyid phyir deng 'dir dbang phyug ma yin zhing //
analyzed: bya ldan nyid phyir deng 'dir dbang phyug ma yin zhing //
translated: Because he has wings, he is not God today.

original: gal te 'di yis 'jug la 'dod par gyur na ni //
analyzed: gal te 'di yis 'jug la 'dod par gyur na ni //
translated: If he is the one who engages in this, then he is the one who desires.

original: de nyid dbang phyug yod pa nyid la byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid dbang phyug yod pa nyid la byed par 'gyur //
translated: That itself is the existence of God.

original: ci ste 'di yi skye la nus pa cung zhig med //
analyzed: ci ste 'di yi skye la nus pa cung zhig med //

original: byis pa bzhin du 'di yis spyod rnams rgyu med do //
analyzed: byis pa bzhin du 'di yis spyod rnams rgyu med do //
translated: then his conduct is without cause, like that of a child.

original: gal te dbang phyug gi ni bdag la mnga' nyid med //
analyzed: gal te dbang phyug gi ni bdag la mnga' nyid med //
translated: If God has no power over himself,

original: 'jig rten bskyed la 'di yi stobs de ci zhig yod //
analyzed: 'jig rten bskyed la 'di yi stobs de ci zhig yod //
translated: what is the power of God in creating the world?

original: ji ltar 'dod la gal te bde sdug la bsnyen na //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod la gal te bde sdug la bsnyen na //
translated: If he is the one who desires, then he is the one who approaches pleasure and pain.

original: 'byung po rnams ni 'jig rten na des byas pa nyid //
analyzed: 'byung po rnams ni 'jig rten na des byas pa nyid //
translated: Then the beings in the world are created by him.

original: gang phyir 'dod la chags pa khong khro la 'jug ste //
analyzed: gang phyir 'dod la chags pa khong khro la 'jug ste //

original: de phyir de yi dbang nyid yod pa ma yin no /
analyzed: de phyir de yi dbang nyid yod pa ma yin no /

original: @66a * // de'i rten nyid la sems med rnams kyis gnas bya ste //
analyzed: @66a * // de'i rten nyid la sems med rnams kyis gnas bya ste //

original: skyes bu'i 'bad rtsol tshad mar gyur pa nyid yin no /
analyzed: skyes bu'i 'bad rtsol tshad mar gyur pa nyid yin no /
translated: The effort of human beings is the measure of his power.

original: las 'bras med par 'gyur zhing lung ni byas min la //
analyzed: las 'bras med par 'gyur zhing lung ni byas min la //
translated: Karma and its effects would not exist, and scripture would be meaningless.

original: las kyi sbyor ba rnams ni de yi rten yin na //
analyzed: las kyi sbyor ba rnams ni de yi rten yin na //
translated: The application of karma is the basis of his power.

original: gal te dbang phyug rang gi las kyis 'gyur na ni //
analyzed: gal te dbang phyug rang gi las kyis 'gyur na ni //
translated: If he were to change through his own karma,

original: thun mong gyur pa'i las la dbang phyug gyur ma yin //
analyzed: thun mong gyur pa'i las la dbang phyug gyur ma yin //
translated: he would not be powerful with regard to shared karma.

original: ci ste de yi khyab bdag rgyu med gyur na ni //
analyzed: ci ste de yi khyab bdag rgyu med gyur na ni //
translated: If he were the universal lord without a cause,

original: 'gro ba kun gyi dbang phyug nyid ni rab tu grub //🔽ci ste de yi dbang phyug nyid gzhan las yin zhing //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun gyi dbang phyug nyid ni rab tu grub // ci ste de yi dbang phyug nyid gzhan las yin zhing //
translated: he would be powerful over all beings.🔽If his power were from another,

original: de nyid kyi yang byed po'i dbang phyug gzhan yin la //
analyzed: de nyid kyi yang byed po'i dbang phyug gzhan yin la //
translated: and that power were from another,

original: de yis gzhan zhes de ltar 'dir ni rnam gzhag med //
analyzed: de yis gzhan zhes de ltar 'dir ni rnam gzhag med //
translated: there would be no such arrangement here.

original: de phyir 'gro ba skyed pa yod pa ma yin nyid //
analyzed: de phyir 'gro ba skyed pa yod pa ma yin nyid //
translated: Therefore, the creation of the world does not exist.

original: dbang phyug skyed por gyur na rigs pas tha dad du //
analyzed: dbang phyug skyed por gyur na rigs pas tha dad du //
translated: If God is the creator, reason shows that he is different.

original: rnam par 'gal ba rnam pa du ma mthong ba ste //
analyzed: rnam par 'gal ba rnam pa du ma mthong ba ste //
translated: Many kinds of contradiction are seen.

original: de yi phyir yang rang bzhin la ni nyes pa de //
analyzed: de yi phyir yang rang bzhin la ni nyes pa de //
translated: Therefore, this fault in intrinsic nature

original: slar yang rab tu chags par 'gyur ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: slar yang rab tu chags par 'gyur ba nyid yin no //
translated: is again well-established.

original: rgyu shes rnams kyi rten ni cung zad rnam log pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu shes rnams kyi rten ni cung zad rnam log pa'o //
translated: The basis of those who know the cause is slightly reversed.

original: rgyu ni bya ba'i cho gar smra ba ma yin zhing //
analyzed: rgyu ni bya ba'i cho gar smra ba ma yin zhing //

original: bya ba'i cho gar sa bon la sogs de dang de //
analyzed: bya ba'i cho gar sa bon la sogs de dang de //
translated: The ritual action is dependent on that seed, etc.

original: ltos pa yin te de phyir rang bzhin rgyu ma yin //
analyzed: ltos pa yin te de phyir rang bzhin rgyu ma yin //
translated: Therefore, intrinsic nature is not the cause.

original: 'bras mi rdzogs par byed pa po ni gcig pa nyid //
analyzed: 'bras mi rdzogs par byed pa po ni gcig pa nyid //
translated: The one who does not complete the result is not the cause of anything.

original: 'ga' zhig gi yang rgyu ni cung zad yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gi yang rgyu ni cung zad yod ma yin //
translated: The cause of anything does not exist in the slightest.

original: gcig gi bdag nyid can gyi rang bzhin rab bstan te //
analyzed: gcig gi bdag nyid can gyi rang bzhin rab bstan te //

original: de phyir rab tu 'jug la rang bzhin rgyu ma yin //
analyzed: de phyir rab tu 'jug la rang bzhin rgyu ma yin //

original: gang gi rang bzhin gyis ni khyab pa nyid 'dod pa //
analyzed: gang gi rang bzhin gyis ni khyab pa nyid 'dod pa //
translated: For whom intrinsic nature is asserted as pervasion,

original: de yi bya ba med pa nyid kyang rab chags shing //
analyzed: de yi bya ba med pa nyid kyang rab chags shing //

original: bya ba ma gtogs 'bras bu'i chog mthong min te //
analyzed: bya ba ma gtogs 'bras bu'i chog mthong min te //
translated: But not the effect, except as an action.

original: de yi phyir yang bskyed la rang bzhin rgyu ma yin //
analyzed: de yi phyir yang bskyed la rang bzhin rgyu ma yin //
translated: Therefore, the nature is not a cause in the production.

original: de yi khyab pa po nyid la ni rgyu nyid phyir //
analyzed: de yi khyab pa po nyid la ni rgyu nyid phyir //
translated: Because it is the pervader itself, it is the cause.

original: thams cad las ni thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad las ni thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur //
translated: Everything would arise from everything, without interruption.

original: 'bras bu'i rab tu 'jug la nges pa mthong ba ste //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rab tu 'jug la nges pa mthong ba ste //
translated: The effect is seen to be restricted to the engagement.

original: de phyir skyed pa la ni rang bzhin rgyu ma yin //
analyzed: de phyir skyed pa la ni rang bzhin rgyu ma yin //
translated: Therefore, the nature is not a cause in the production.

original: ji ltar 'di yi yon tan med nyid grub pa ste //
analyzed: ji ltar 'di yi yon tan med nyid grub pa ste //

original: de ltar 'bras bu la ni yon tan med nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: de ltar 'bras bu la ni yon tan med nyid 'gyur //
translated: In the same way, the absence of quality in the effect will be.

original: rnam 'gyur yon tan can rnams 'jig rten na mthong ste //
analyzed: rnam 'gyur yon tan can rnams 'jig rten na mthong ste //
translated: The transformations with quality are seen in the world.

original: de phyir rab tu 'jug la rang bzhin rgyu ma yin //
analyzed: de phyir rab tu 'jug la rang bzhin rgyu ma yin //
translated: Therefore, the nature is not a cause in the engagement.

original: rtag pa'i rgyu las khyad par 'gyur ba ma yin phyir //
analyzed: rtag pa'i rgyu las khyad par 'gyur ba ma yin phyir //
translated: Because there is no difference from the permanent cause,

original: rnam 'gyur la ni tha dad yon tan nyid ma yin //
analyzed: rnam 'gyur la ni tha dad yon tan nyid ma yin //
translated: The difference in quality is not in the transformation.

original: rnam 'gyur la ni tha dad yon tan zhugs pa ste //
analyzed: rnam 'gyur la ni tha dad yon tan zhugs pa ste //

original: de phyir rang bzhin las ni skyed pa rigs ma yin //
analyzed: de phyir rang bzhin las ni skyed pa rigs ma yin //

original: rang bzhin gyis ni bskyed pa'i bdag nyid can nyid la //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni bskyed pa'i bdag nyid can nyid la //
translated: But the nature of the self is not produced.

original: 'bras bu rnams su nyams pa'i rgyu ni grub ma yin //
analyzed: 'bras bu rnams su nyams pa'i rgyu ni grub ma yin //
translated: And the cause of the destruction of the effect is not established.

original: gang @66b phyir rnam 'gyur gyi ni nyams pa mthong ba ste //
analyzed: gang @66b phyir rnam 'gyur gyi ni nyams pa mthong ba ste //
translated: Because the destruction of the modifications is seen,

original: de phyir rtogs par bya ba rgyu ni gzhan nyid do //
analyzed: de phyir rtogs par bya ba rgyu ni gzhan nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the cause to be understood is something else.

original: nus par gyur pa'i sbyor la shin tu mthar thug pa'i //
analyzed: nus par gyur pa'i sbyor la shin tu mthar thug pa'i //
translated: In the application that has become capable, which is extremely final,

original: thar pa 'dod pa'i sdom brtson rnams kyi ma yin zhing //
analyzed: thar pa 'dod pa'i sdom brtson rnams kyi ma yin zhing //
translated: It is not for those who strive for liberation,

original: skye dgu rnams kyi rang bzhin rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir //
analyzed: skye dgu rnams kyi rang bzhin rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the nature of beings is fully engaged.

original: gang las thar pa'i ched dang pha rol gnon par gyur //
analyzed: gang las thar pa'i ched dang pha rol gnon par gyur //
translated: From where is liberation for the sake of which there is the practice of austerities?

original: skyed pa'i bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis ni nges nyid phyir //
analyzed: skyed pa'i bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis ni nges nyid phyir //
translated: Because the nature of the self, which is productive, is determined by nature itself,

original: de yi bdag nyid rnam 'gyur la ni nges nyid yin //
analyzed: de yi bdag nyid rnam 'gyur la ni nges nyid yin //
translated: The nature of the modifications is determined by that very self.

original: 'jig rten dag na rnam 'gyur la ni brtan nyid med //
analyzed: 'jig rten dag na rnam 'gyur la ni brtan nyid med //
translated: In the world, the modifications are not stable,

original: de phyir rang bzhin gyis ni skyed par rigs ma yin //
analyzed: de phyir rang bzhin gyis ni skyed par rigs ma yin //
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable that they are produced by nature.

original: sems kyi spyod pa mi gsal rang bzhin zhes bya zhing //
analyzed: sems kyi spyod pa mi gsal rang bzhin zhes bya zhing //

original: rnam 'gyur gsal ba 'di ni de nas grags pa ste //
analyzed: rnam 'gyur gsal ba 'di ni de nas grags pa ste //
translated: This manifestation is then known as the effect.

original: de phyir rab tu 'jug la rang bzhin rgyu min zhing //
analyzed: de phyir rab tu 'jug la rang bzhin rgyu min zhing //
translated: Therefore, the nature is not the cause of engagement.

analyzed: gsal ba'i rgyu la 'dir ni 'bras bu grub pa nyid // sems med rang bzhin las ni sems dang bcas pa yi //
translated: The effect is established here as the cause of manifestation.

original: rta glang bong bu la sogs 'bras bu rigs pa ma yin zhing //
analyzed: rta glang bong bu la sogs 'bras bu rigs pa ma yin zhing //
translated: It is not reasonable for the effect, such as a horse, an ox, or an ass,🔽to arise from a nature that is devoid of mind.

original: sems dang rnam par bral ba'i rgyu rnams dag las ni //
analyzed: sems dang rnam par bral ba'i rgyu rnams dag las ni //
translated: From causes that are devoid of mind,

original: sems dang ldan pa cung zad zhig ni 'jug ma yin //
analyzed: sems dang ldan pa cung zad zhig ni 'jug ma yin //
translated: not even the slightest thing endowed with mind arises.

original: gal te 'gro ba skyed phyir dus ni nges pa ste //
analyzed: gal te 'gro ba skyed phyir dus ni nges pa ste //
translated: If time is definite because it produces beings,

original: de phyir yongs su rtog byed rnams kyis thar pa med //
analyzed: de phyir yongs su rtog byed rnams kyis thar pa med //
translated: then there is no liberation for those who imagine it.

original: gang phyir skye dgu rnams kyi mtha' ni byas min te //
analyzed: gang phyir skye dgu rnams kyi mtha' ni byas min te //
translated: Because the end of beings is not created,

original: de phyir 'jig rten rgyun chad med par skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de phyir 'jig rten rgyun chad med par skye bar 'gyur //
translated: the world arises without interruption.

original: gang zhig yon tan rnams kyi gcig dang du mas byas //
analyzed: gang zhig yon tan rnams kyi gcig dang du mas byas //
translated: That which is made of one or many qualities,

original: rjes rnams su ni rang nyid nges pa mthong ba ste //
analyzed: rjes rnams su ni rang nyid nges pa mthong ba ste //
translated: is seen by itself in the subsequent moments.

original: gal te rgyu gcig nyid du gnas par gyur pa na //
analyzed: gal te rgyu gcig nyid du gnas par gyur pa na //
translated: If the cause remains as one,

analyzed: de yang tha dad khyad par gyur pa ma yin no // gang zhig smin pa las skyes rdzas kyi cho gar sar //

analyzed: yon tan shes pas yon tan tha dang nyid du mthong //
translated: by one who knows the qualities as distinct.

original: gang phyir rgyu ni khyad par min pa 'dod pa ste //
analyzed: gang phyir rgyu ni khyad par min pa 'dod pa ste //

analyzed: stong pa'i rdzas rnams su yang nges par gyur pa nyid //

original: gang gi mi gsal ba las rdzas ni 'char ba ste //
analyzed: gang gi mi gsal ba las rdzas ni 'char ba ste //
translated: That which arises from the unclear substance,

original: de yi rjes su dpag pa nges par grub ma yin //
analyzed: de yi rjes su dpag pa nges par grub ma yin //
translated: its inference is not established with certainty.

original: 'bras bu gsal ba yi ni yang dag rab 'jug pa //
analyzed: 'bras bu gsal ba yi ni yang dag rab 'jug pa //
translated: The clear effect does not truly arise

original: mi gsal ba las gang gis mngon du mthong ma yin ;
analyzed: mi gsal ba las gang gis mngon du mthong ma yin ;
translated: from the unclear, as it is not seen.

original: / gsal ba gnyis pa dag las rab tu 'jug pa bzhin //
analyzed: / gsal ba gnyis pa dag las rab tu 'jug pa bzhin //

analyzed: mi gsal ba las gang gi 'bras bu dang por gyur //

analyzed: de yi 'dod pa las 'dir mi 'dod chen po'o //

original: rang bzhin nyid kyis nyes pa gnyis ni rab tu chags //
analyzed: rang bzhin nyid kyis nyes pa gnyis ni rab tu chags //
translated: The two faults by nature are greatly attached.

analyzed: ji ltar gser gyi phreng ba khyad par 'phags pa ste // de ltar rang bzhin @67a * //
translated: Just as a golden chain is distinguished by its nature,

original: gyi ni rnam 'gyur khyad par 'phags //
analyzed: gyi ni rnam 'gyur khyad par 'phags //

original: 'bras bu khyad par yin zhing rgyu yi ma yin te //
analyzed: 'bras bu khyad par yin zhing rgyu yi ma yin te //
translated: The effect is distinguished by its cause, but the cause is not distinguished by its effect.

original: de phyir skyed la rang bzhin rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de phyir skyed la rang bzhin rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable that the effect is produced by the cause.

original: gal te bya bar skyes bu de ni rgyu yin na //
analyzed: gal te bya bar skyes bu de ni rgyu yin na //

original: gang gis nges par gang 'dod des de 'thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: gang gis nges par gang 'dod des de 'thob par 'gyur //

original: 'dod kyang kha cig don ni 'thob pa ma yin la //
analyzed: 'dod kyang kha cig don ni 'thob pa ma yin la //
